profileAlternative.name: Ankit Gupta
profileAlternative.headline: Sr. UI & JavaScript Developer at knowledge Momentum
profileAlternative.location: Gautam Buddha Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India
profileAlternative.summary:
Summary of Experience:

• Having 3.1+ years of experience in Web/UI technologies
• Excellent knowledge of HTML5, HTML4, CSS3 and Javascript Jquery with the ability of hand coding.
• Have good knowledge of javascript framework like Angular, KnockOut, D3 and many more.
• Extensive knowledge of web standards, CSS-driven layouts and Email templates.
• Having very good Experience in working with collaboratively across multiple functional areas to implement website/product design initiatives.
• Responsible for Interaction Design, Wireframes and Visual Design
• Capable to develop responsive and cross browser compatible applications.
• Capable to develop responsive and cross browser compatible applications By Bootstrap etc.
